subject: Baseball
Bankruptcies
lead_paragraph: The bankrupt Los Angeles Dodgers have sought court permission to auction the team’s media rights earlier than scheduled to bolster the sale of the team under a recent settlement with Major League Baseball, according to court documents.
snippet: The bankrupt Los Angeles Dodgers have sought court permission to auction the team’s media rights earlier than scheduled to bolster the sale of the team under a recent settlement with Major League Baseball, according to court documents.
